messages.subject: Two more manga's related to the Shisengumi
messages.msgSnippet:
The first one I m pretty sure just came out in 2004... I haven t had 
much time to look for more info yet (yes it s 3:30 and I have to be 
up in 2 1/2 hrs...
messages.messageBody:
The first one I'm pretty sure just came out in 2004... I haven't had
much time to look for more info yet (yes it's 3:30 and I have to be
up in 2 1/2 hrs... *sighs*)

Just to let you guys/gals know that we have to be on the look
out.. :O)

The first one, I believe have three volumes out already... The first
I think was Kondou, then Hijikata, then Okita... I think this manga
is still on-going so I'm crossing my fingers for a Saitou volume to
come out. From what a friend told me it's not like a continuing
story but more like each volume is based on one character. Oh sorry
I must be sleepy. Incoherent thoughts right now.

I did a furigana to translate it to romaji. I think it come out
okay. Just don't rely too much on my spelling below... Oh well...
